item.description:
All of the plans and coordination for our Spring event will take place during this call, including location, photo requirements, models, etc.

I need everyone who will be participating to RSVP today. I know everyone is busy, however in order to have a successful event, we need to be prepared.

Please rsvp with your skype name.

My skype name is lorrie.pearson
item.why: We really need to get the plans in place for the photo event to happen. This event is coming up soon. Everyone who is planning to participate really needs to be on this call. if you do not have skype, download for free.

group.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist

item.name: Skype meeting to plan Spring photo event
